QUOTATION_NAME.description: The name or title of the quote

OPPORTUNITY_ID.description: The ID of the opportunity associated with the quote

CONTACT_ID.description: The ID of the contact associated with the quote

ORGANISATION_ID.description: The ID of the organization associated with the quote

PRICEBOOK_ID.description: The ID of the price book used for pricing in the quote

QUOTATION_NUMBER.description: The unique number or identifier of the quote

QUOTATION_DESCRIPTION.description: The description or notes associated with the quote

QUOTATION_PHONE.description: The phone number associated with the quote

QUOTATION_EMAIL.description: The email address associated with the quote

QUOTATION_FAX.description: The fax number associated with the quote

QUOTE_STATUS.description: The status of the quote (e.g., drafted, sent, accepted)

QUOTATION_EXPIRATION_DATE.description: The date and time the quote is set to expire

LINE_ITEM_COUNT.description: The number of line items in the quote

IS_SYNCING.description: Flag indicating if the quote is currently being synced

QUOTATION_CURRENCY_CODE.description: The currency code used for the quote

SUBTOTAL.description: The subtotal amount before discounts and taxes

DISCOUNT.description: The discount applied to the quote

TOTAL_PRICE.description: The total price of the quote after applying all charges and discounts

SHIPPING_HANDLING.description: The shipping and handling charges applied to the quote

TAX.description: The tax amount applied to the quote

GRAND_TOTAL.description: The total amount of the quote including all charges and discounts

ADDRESS_BILLING_NAME.description: The name associated with the billing address

ADDRESS_BILLING_STREET.description: The street of the billing address

ADDRESS_BILLING_CITY.description: The city of the billing address

ADDRESS_BILLING_STATE.description: The state of the billing address

ADDRESS_BILLING_POSTCODE.description: The postal code of the billing address

ADDRESS_BILLING_COUNTRY.description: The country of the billing address

ADDRESS_SHIPPING_NAME.description: The name associated with the shipping address

ADDRESS_SHIPPING_STREET.description: The street of the shipping address

ADDRESS_SHIPPING_CITY.description: The city of the shipping address

ADDRESS_SHIPPING_STATE.description: The state of the shipping address

ADDRESS_SHIPPING_POSTCODE.description: The postal code of the shipping address

ADDRESS_SHIPPING_COUNTRY.description: The country of the shipping address

OWNER_USER_ID.description: The ID of the user who owns the quote

DATE_CREATED_UTC.description: The date and time the quote was created in UTC

DATE_UPDATED_UTC.description: The date and time the quote was last updated in UTC

CREATED_USER_ID.description: The ID of the user who created the quote

CUSTOMFIELDS.description: Custom fields associated with the quote

FIELD_NAME.description: The name of the custom field

FIELD_VALUE.description: The value of the custom field
